attributes.action: Send help to the Brazilian government to help fight the Amazon Rainforest Fire
attributes.additional_details: The Brazilian government needs help in tackling this serious environmental issue
attributes.background: The Amazon Rainforest fire is a global issue and it requires a coordinated global response.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The UK Government has already made aid available, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/pm-steps-up-uk-efforts-to-protect-the-amazon-rainforest

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, for example a petition calling for an increase in the amount of aid.
